title: Adaptive Trend and Cycle Analysis for Time Series — adaptive_cycle_trend_analysis
text: Performs adaptive trend estimation, cycle detection, Fourier harmonic selection, bootstrap confidence intervals, change points detection, rolling-origin forecasting. Supports LOESS, GAM, GAMM models, automatically handles irregular sampling using Lomb Scargle periodogram.
